name: Package Delivery Service
description:
Oh no! You're trapped in the warehouse with no way out! If only the packages could help you escape...

Controls:

A / S - move left / right

Space - Jump

E - Interact

R - Reset Level

Esc - Pause Menu

All Assets/SFX/Music/Cutscenese were made during the Jam, so because of the heavy amount of content we had to produce, we barely had the time to build any actual gameplay.

UPDATES COMING VERY SOON!!!
